question: The United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) declared which of the following decade as the United Nations Decade on Biodiversity and United Nations Decade for Deserts and the Fight against Desertification?
explanation: The United Nations General Assembly also called as UNGA has declared the decade 2011-20 as the United Nations Decade on Biodiversity and United Nations Decade for Deserts and the Fight against Desertification.
